description: Try our easy to follow Three Cheese Pasta with Basil & Tomatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Three Cheese Pasta with Basil & Tomatoes
name: Three Cheese Pasta with Basil & Tomatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine remaining mozzarella and parmesan and scatter over pasta. Finish with remaining tomato. Bake for 35-40 minutes or until golden and bubbling. Scatter pasta with small basil leaves and serve.
Combine remaining mozzarella and parmesan and scatter over pasta. Finish with remaining tomato. Bake for 35-40 minutes or until golden and bubbling. Scatter pasta with small basil leaves and serve.
